alert.note: Alert for Allegan; Barry; Kalamazoo; Van Buren (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 9:46PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Van Buren, Allegan, western Barry and Kalamazoo Counties through 1045 PM EDT... At 946 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wayland to near Martin to 5 miles south of Hartford. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kalamazoo... Portage... Hastings... Allegan... South Haven... Paw Paw... Wayland... Otsego... Plainwell... Middleville... Vicksburg... Hartford... Galesburg... Mattawan... Lawton... Bangor... Decatur... Schoolcraft... Climax... Richland... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
